name: The entire history of you
description: Bellingcat is a journalism collective using social media platforms and surveillance footage for their investigations.

key_work.title: Eliot Higgins, the founder of investigative journalism group Bellingcat, London
key_work.brief_description: Investigative journalism collective Bellingcat was the first to discover that Malaysia Airlines flight MH17 was downed by a missile fired from Ukraine. Its members use open-source intelligence to gather information from social media, public sources and geolocation to identify people, weapons and locations.

constellations_primary.name: The entire history of you
constellations_primary.description: Bellingcat is a journalism collective using social media platforms and surveillance footage for their investigations.

start.title: Bellingcat: Truth in a Post-Truth World
start.creator_credit: Bruno Felix, Femke Wolting, Submarine and Hans Pool
start.brief_description: A first-hand look into the revolutionary rise of the “citizen investigative journalist” collective known as Bellingcat.

constellations_other.name: The entire history of you
constellations_other.description: Bellingcat is a journalism collective using social media platforms and surveillance footage for their investigations.

end.title: The Social Network
end.creator_credit: Ceán Chaffin, Dana Brunetti, Michael De Luca, Scott Rudin, Columbia Pictures, Relativity Media, Scott Rudin Productions, Michael De Luca Productions, Trigger Street Productions, Sony Pictures, Aaron Sorkin, Donald Graham Burt, David Fincher, David E. Scott and Jacqueline West
end.brief_description: David Fincher takes on the shady beginnings of Facebook with a script from Aaron Sorkin.

constellations_other.name: The entire history of you
constellations_other.description: Bellingcat is a journalism collective using social media platforms and surveillance footage for their investigations.

links.description: Social media accounts can now be used as part of criminal investigations. The film The Social Network dramatises the origins of website Facebook, founded by Mark Zuckerberg in 2003.

start.title: The Social Network
start.creator_credit: Ceán Chaffin, Dana Brunetti, Michael De Luca, Scott Rudin, Columbia Pictures, Relativity Media, Scott Rudin Productions, Michael De Luca Productions, Trigger Street Productions, Sony Pictures, Aaron Sorkin, Donald Graham Burt, David Fincher, David E. Scott and Jacqueline West
start.brief_description: David Fincher takes on the shady beginnings of Facebook with a script from Aaron Sorkin.

constellations_other.name: The entire history of you
constellations_other.description: Bellingcat is a journalism collective using social media platforms and surveillance footage for their investigations.

end.title: The Circle
end.creator_credit: Walter F. Parkes, Anthony Bregman, Gary Goetzman, Tom Hanks, Playtone, Image Nation, Likely Story, STX Entertainment, James Ponsoldt, Gerald Sullivan, Dave Eggers and Emma Potter

video_links.name: The Circle | Official Trailer | Own it Now on Digital HD, Blu-ray & DVD

end.brief_description: A young tech worker takes a job at a powerful Internet corporation, quickly rises up the company’s ranks, and soon finds herself in a perilous situation concerning privacy, surveillance and freedom. She comes to learn that her decisions and actions will determine the future of humanity.

constellations_other.name: The entire history of you
constellations_other.description: Bellingcat is a journalism collective using social media platforms and surveillance footage for their investigations.

links.description: Critically panned thriller The Circle follows Emma Watson working for a cult-like technology and social media company that touts transparency as a guise for the invasion of privacy.

start.title: Bellingcat: Truth in a Post-Truth World
start.creator_credit: Bruno Felix, Femke Wolting, Submarine and Hans Pool
start.brief_description: A first-hand look into the revolutionary rise of the “citizen investigative journalist” collective known as Bellingcat.

constellations_other.name: The entire history of you
constellations_other.description: Bellingcat is a journalism collective using social media platforms and surveillance footage for their investigations.

end.title: Citizenfour
end.creator_credit: Laura Poitras, Dirk Wilutzky, Mathilde Bonnefoy, JustFilms / Ford Foundation, The Bertha Foundation, RADiUS-TWC and Kirsten Johnson
end.headline_credit: Germany, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2014
end.brief_description: Laura Poitras blurs the line between documentary and investigative journalism. Poitras was one of three journalists confided in by whistleblower Edward Snowden when he shared classified documents that detailed global government surveillance. Telling his story earned Poitras a Pulitzer, while Citizenfour won an Oscar.

constellations_primary.name: Freedom from surveillance
constellations_primary.description: Real world and cinematic authoritarianism and resistance explored through documentaries, Hollywood blockbusters, TV and videogames.

constellations_other.name: Orwell & Snowden
constellations_other.description: Explores Orwell as a representation of the NSA, and the infamous Snowden leak.

constellations_other.name: The entire history of you
constellations_other.description: Bellingcat is a journalism collective using social media platforms and surveillance footage for their investigations.

links.description: Whistleblower Edward Snowden released classified documents on the CIA’s global surveillance program, raising privacy concerns. Snowden was the subject of Laura Poitras’ documentary Citizenfour.

start.title: The Fifth Estate
start.creator_credit: Michael Sugar, Steve Golin, Participant, Reliance Entertainment, Touchstone Pictures, Anonymous Content, DreamWorks Pictures, Bill Condon, Josh Singer, Mark Tildesley and Shay Cunliffe
start.headline_credit: Belgium, India and United States of America, 2013
start.brief_description: A look at the relationship between WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange and his early supporter and eventual colleague Daniel Domscheit-Berg, and how the website’s growth and influence led to an irreparable rift between the two friends.

constellations_other.name: The entire history of you
constellations_other.description: Bellingcat is a journalism collective using social media platforms and surveillance footage for their investigations.

end.title: The Imitation Game
end.creator_credit: Ido Ostrowsky, Nora Grossman, Teddy Schwarzman, Bristol Automotive, Black Bear Pictures, Maria Djurkovic, Sammy Sheldon, Morten Tyldum, Graham Moore, The Weinstein Company and Peter Heslop
end.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2014
end.brief_description: Based on the real life story of legendary cryptanalyst Alan Turing, the film portrays the nail-biting race against time by Turing and his brilliant team of code-breakers at Britain’s top-secret Government Code and Cypher School at Bletchley Park, during the darkest days of World War II.

constellations_other.name: The entire history of you
constellations_other.description: Bellingcat is a journalism collective using social media platforms and surveillance footage for their investigations.

links.description: Benedict Cumberbatch stars as Julian Assange in The Fifth Estate, and also plays mathematician and computer scientist Alan Turing in The Imitation Game. The drama tells the story of an MI6 team, led by Turing, breaking the Enigma code during WWII.

start.title: The Circle

She comes to learn that her decisions and actions will determine the future of humanity.

end.title: Black Mirror
end.creator_credit: Laurie Borg, Louise Sutton, Toby Haynes, Charlie Brooker, William Bridges, Phil Sims and Owen Harris

video_links.name: Black Mirror | Welcome to the Darkness | Netflix
Black Mirror - Season 3 | Official Trailer [HD] | Netflix
Black Mirror - U.S.S. Callister | Official Trailer [HD] | Netflix

end.brief_description: A contemporary reworking of The Twilight Zone format that taps into our collective unease about our world, particularly our relationship to technology, Black Mirror explores the everyday dystopia we may already be living in.

constellations_other.name: Good vibrations
constellations_other.description: Since its invention, the humble theremin has been used in a number of different ways to evoke all sorts of strange sounds and moods.

constellations_other.name: The perils of new technology
constellations_other.description: Explores our fascination with, and our anxiety surrounding, new technology, which is something that can bring about significant cultural change but also danger.

constellations_other.name: The entire history of you
constellations_other.description: Bellingcat is a journalism collective using social media platforms and surveillance footage for their investigations.

links.description: British TV series Black Mirror (2011–present) explores modern society’s use of and dependence on technology, set in a dystopian near-future with a dark and satirical tone, like The Circle.

links.description: Laura Poitras also released a documentary, Risk in 2016, about Julian Assange, the controversial leader of WikiLeaks, in a film that explored the difficult ethics of documentary making. Feature film The Fifth Estate dramatises the life of Assange.

links.description: The documentary Bellingcat: Truth in a Post-Truth World explores the journalism collective and the way they use open-source intelligence to investigate events in warzones and conflicts.
